text: Louis Lincoln Emmerson (December 27, 1863 â€“ February 4, 1941) was a Republican politician. He was the Governor of Illinois. He served from 1929 to 1933. Before serving as governor, Emmerson served as Illinois Secretary of State from 1917 to 1929. title: Louis Lincoln Emmerson
